comments:
Build ID: M20060921-0945

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Was running the project EclipseTrader (eclipsetrader.sf.net) which is an RCP application but I am fairly certain this error has nothing to do with it but is a problem with SWT Table on a MAc since I have run the same version on Linux and Windows and no problem.
2. Consistently when I open a watchlist in the application which is a Table widget and then choose streaming, which would cause the rows to highligh and change colors, the application consistently crashes with the attached stack trace and looks like the widget is trying to change the background color of a table cell or row but the Color object has been disposed of already. I can reproduce this consistently.


More information:
13:01:54,154 ERROR runtime:36 - Unhandled event loop exception

This bug was not an issue with SWT on MAC OS X it was a bug in the RC appliction
